name: presentation
description: Presentation for RAiD Aug 25 Engineering Meetup. Requires python to run

scripts.slides: concurrently -k -n static,mkslides -c green,cyan "npm run serve-static" "npm run serve-slides"
scripts.restart-db: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d && wait-on -d 1000 tcp:5432
scripts.start-3: npm run restart-db && prisma db push --schema=./exercises/3_physical_schema/schema.prisma && ts-node src/3_schema/index.ts && prisma studio --schema=./exercises/3_physical_schema/schema.prisma -b none
scripts.sample-3: npm run restart-db && prisma db push --schema=./exercises/sample-solutions/3_physical_schema/schema.prisma && ts-node src/3_schema/index.ts && prisma studio --schema=./exercises/sample-solutions/3_physical_schema/schema.prisma -b none
scripts.start-4: npm run restart-db && prisma db push --schema=./exercises/4_indexing/schema.prisma && ts-node src/4_benchmarking/index.ts && prisma studio --schema=./exercises/sample-solutions/4_indexing/schema.prisma -b none
scripts.sample-4: npm run restart-db && prisma db push --schema=./exercises/sample-solutions/4_indexing/schema.prisma && ts-node src/4_benchmarking/index.ts sample && prisma studio --schema=./exercises/sample-solutions/4_indexing/schema.prisma -b none
scripts.reset-5: npm run restart-db && prisma db push --schema=./exercises/5_migration/schema.prisma && ts-node src/5_migration/reset.ts && npx prisma migrate resolve --applied 0_init && prisma studio --schema=./exercises/5_migration/schema.prisma -b none
